titleStmt.title: A key (with the whip) to open the mystery & iniquity of the poem called, Absalom & Achitophel shewing its scurrilous reflections upon both king and kingdom.
titleStmt.author: Ness, Christopher, 1621-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Christopher Ness. Cf. BM.
